en-US.summary: Nature Sounds will put you at peace and help you to sleep, relax, meditate, relieve stress, or block out unwanted noises.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play Rain
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play Wild River and loop
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play randomly
en-US.name: Nature Sounds
en-US.description:
Nature Sounds will put you at peace and help you to sleep, relax, meditate, relieve stress, or block out unwanted noises. It will rejuvenate your body, mind and spirit. Nature Sounds are perfect musical accompaniment for meditation, yoga, healing and complete mind and body relaxation.

INCLUDED SOUNDS:

    1. Rain  
    2. Thunderstorm
    3. Rain on a Tin Roof
    4. Rain on a Tent
    5. Ocean
    6. Waterfall
    7. Smooth River
    8. Wild River
    9. Wind
    10. Windy Leaves
    11. Windy Trees
    12. Fountains
    13. Forest Night
    14. Forest Morning
    15. Campfire

HOW TO USE/ COMMANDS:

Get started by saying "Alexa, open Nature Sounds".

For a full list of available sounds, use
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds for a list.
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to list all sounds.

Alexa will speak a list of supported sounds and place a readable list in the Alexa smartphone app.

To start a sound immediately or change sounds while a sound is playing, just say: 
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play RAIN"
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play THUNDERSTORM
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play RAIN ON A TIN ROOF
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play RAIN ON A TENT
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play OCEAN
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play SMOOTH RIVER
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play WILD RIVER
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play WIND
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play WINDY LEAVES
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play WILD TREES
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play FOUNTAINS
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play FOREST NIGHT
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play FOREST MORNING
Alexa, ask Nature Sounds to play CAMPFIRE

To play sound in loop, use:
Alexa, ask Nature sounds to play RAIN in loop
 (and similarly, for other sounds)

To turn off loop,
Alexa, ask Nature sounds to disable loop

If you're feeling a little adventurous, say “Alexa, ask nature sounds to play randomly” to let Nature Sounds pick a sound for you!

To pause sound when it playing, use:
Alexa, pause
Alexa, stop

To resume sound when it paused
Alexa, resume
Alexa, continue 

To stop the sound when it playing
Alexa, cancel 

Default intent for help
Alexa, ask Nature sounds for help

SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:

Please leave a 5-star review if you love this Skill, or send us your suggestions. Your 5-star reviews encourage us to keep making more great sounds and voice apps.


---------------------------------------------------------------

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
To test the skill tester need to say one of these phrases: 
- Alexa, ask nature sound to play Rain
- Alexa, ask nature sound to play Wild River and loop
- Alexa, ask nature sound to play Randomly
- Alexa, ask nature sound to loop
